short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that helps traders get in and out of positions from kaigostocks.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
KaigoStocks is the only quant-based options signals service for the retail trader. Our algo posits trade ideas with specific entries and exits, and we show past performance of each signal with backtested and forward-tested data from the last 3-10 years. This extension allows our users to easily get in and out of our signals with a click of a button.

Our extension saves no data about the user's account. Further, the extension never submits any trades on behalf the user -- we require the user to review and submit all of their trades manually.
